query:
ALTER TABLE payment_settings 
ADD COLUMN pix_min_amount INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1000,
ADD COLUMN pix_bonus_percentage INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 5,
ADD COLUMN stripe_min_amount INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 2000,
ADD COLUMN stripe_bonus_percentage INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
